title: Integrate DB generator into generation pipeline
description: Add DB collection generation step to generator.ts. Output to src/generated/<source>/db/collections.ts. Wire up config options to adapter calls.

title: Fix TanStack DB collection generator API mismatch
Implement GraphQL entity discovery and collection generation
description: Discover entities from queries returning list types ([Pet!]!). Map mutations by naming convention (createPet, updatePet, deletePet). Generate queryCollectionOptions with handlers.

title: Document TanStack DB integration
description: Add documentation for db generator config, entity detection behavior, key field configuration, and usage examples. Update README and docs site.

title: Add db generator to config schema
description: Add 'db' key to generates config with collectionType (query) and optional collections override for key field mapping. Update Zod schema in config.ts.

title: TanStack DB collection generator
description: Generate TanStack DB collection options for each source (GraphQL/OpenAPI). Supports queryCollectionOptions with auto-detected CRUD mutations, key field detection, and factory functions for QueryClient injection.

title: Extend adapter interface with generateCollections()
description: Add generateCollections() method to Adapter interface. Method should return entity metadata (name, keyField, mutations) for collection generation.

title: Implement OpenAPI entity discovery and collection generation
description: Discover entities from GET endpoints returning arrays. Map CRUD operations by path pattern (POST /pets, PUT /pets/{id}, DELETE /pets/{id}). Generate queryCollectionOptions with handlers.

title: Add tests for DB collection generator
description: Add unit tests for entity discovery, key field detection, mutation mapping, and collection options generation. Include snapshot tests for generated output.
